body_html:
@anikalindtner I know, sorry to bother with this issue 😅 I was going to say but I didn't want to make the comment too long: they don't mind the emails. It's more of a "by the way, this happens" more than "urgent help needed!!" (Also, I think that they were worried that the emails might leave some sort of mark as if they weren't doing the logs, so they checked up on this with me)

No problem at all, thank you! 😄
